content: as the snowflake will grow a little when drying and you will need this extra space to maintain the proper shaping d use the guidelines of the template to help achieve symmetry e don t worry if your piece is not exactly perfect… neither are real snowflakes each is unique to itself including the errors… and still exquisite to look at just as your creations are 7 | page copyright © 2022 by jessica wifall all rights reserved copyright copyright © 2022 by jessica wifall all rights reserved please do not sell redistribute or edit this pattern in anyway you may sell the finished products but please credit me as the designer of the pattern 8 | page copyright © 2022 by jessica wifall all rights reserved 9 | page copyright © 2022 by jessica wifall all rights reserved
